snippet: VAN NORDEN--Gwendolyn "Joy" Olson. My sister, Joy, and I shared a lifetime of memories, experiences and opinions. Always close, Joy's death is a great loss and I miss her so much. Mourned by Kay Olson Freeman. 1/3
lead_paragraph: VAN NORDEN--Gwendolyn "Joy" Olson. My sister, Joy, and I shared a lifetime of memories, experiences and opinions. Always close, Joy's death is a great loss and I miss her so much. Mourned by Kay Olson Freeman. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  VAN NORDEN, GWENDOLYN "JOY" OLSON
